disclaimer.text:
Are you running low on cheques? Simply complete the form below and your cheques will be delivered to your home or branch within 2-4 weeks. Cheques ordered using this online form will be the Vancity unique design personal cheques
(view cheque pricing and design).

To order a different design you can: contact your branch, or call D+H at 1-800-268-7862.

COBKeyFactsStatementsForm.title: Key Facts Statements
COBKeyFactsStatementsForm.description: The Current Account individual is a type of personal bank account designed for your everyday transactions. Bank Current Account doesn't offer any interest on your credit balance. However, you can conveniently access your account using an international Debit card that is free of cost. In addition, our mobile application and online banking services allow you to monitor your transactions 24/7. This KFS provides you with all the essential information about the product's key features, as well as indicative details about its interest,fees, and charges.

changePinDesc.text: Enter your current 4 digit Credit Card PIN

instructions1.label: PIN cannot match portions of your card number.

instructions2.label: PIN cannot match your card's expiry date.

instructions3.label: PIN cannot be a simple sequence of numbers which may be easily guessed.

activateCard.title: Received your new card?
activateCard.instructions: To change the PIN for this card, you'll need to activate it first.

successModal.title: Success!
successModal.subtitle1: The PIN associated with your card ending in
successModal.messageHtml:
For your first two in-store purchases, you'll need to insert your card into the chip reader and enter your PIN before you can use the tap feature.

If you remember your old PIN:

The first in-store purchase will require you to enter the old PIN. Once completed, your new PIN can be used for subsequent chip and PIN transactions.

If you don't remember your old PIN:

The first in-store purchase will require you to enter your new PIN up to 4 times in order to approve the transaction and activate the new PIN for the card.


During this process, you may be presented with messages, such as 'Incorrect PIN' or 'Last Try' and a signature may be required. Don’t worry - this is expected.

For subsequent chip and PIN transactions, you may use the new PIN.

errorModal.title: Change PIN Failed.
errorModal.subtitle1: The PIN associated with your card ending in
errorModal.subtitle2: could not be updated. Please try again or contact Card Services for assistance.

terms-note.label2: The Member agrees to indemnify and save Vancouver City Savings Credit Union harmless from all costs, damages and liability of any nature whatsoever, whether direct, indirect, special or consequential, and incurred by Vancity in connection with it acting upon this Stop Payment, even if the Member has advised Vancity of such consequences, and that Vancity may debit the Account with such costs, damages and liability. newTerms.label:
Visit our Chequing or Savings account page to find out what account is right for you.
  • To have your monthly account fee waived on eligible accounts you must retain the required minimum daily balance for the entire calendar month. Please review the Personal service charge bulletin for balance requirements.

termsFlag.label:
• When you choose to change your chequing or savings account type, your balance, account number, direct deposit payroll, pre-authorized payments, scheduled transfers, and bill payment vendors will all remain unchanged.
  • Note: If you've renamed your account or have a line of credit your new account type will not be displayed, and you will keep your renamed title.

ApplyLoan.headerDesc: A smarter alternative to a payday lender. With eligibility based on your income, not your credit score.

applySteps.step1Desc: Apply online and have your loan funded to your account within 10 minutes.
applySteps.step2Desc: Decide how often to make payments and how long you need to pay back your loan.
applySteps.step3Desc: Make additional payments with no penalties if you want to pay back your loan early.

ApplyLoan.detail1: Best for: If you need cash in a hurry, are worried about your credit score, and are considering using a payday lender.
ApplyLoan.detail3: Approval: Based on income, No credit check required.
ApplyLoan.detail5: Term: Pay back in as little as 2 weeks, or take a maximum of 2 years.

disclaimer.one: The annual percentage rate (APR) is compounded monthly, not in advance. APR assumes no fees or charges apply.
disclaimer.two: If additional fees and/or charges apply, the total Cost of Credit and APR would increase.
disclaimer.three: This Product, its features and advertised interest rates may change at any time and may be withdrawn by Vancity at any time for any reason without prior notice to the member.
disclaimer.four: Vancity Fair and Fast LoanTM is a trademark of Vancouver City Savings Credit Union.

amountTooltip.title: Send limits
amountTooltip.message: Limits are calculated based on the date and time of the transaction. For example, if the first transaction is sent at 11:30 am, “day” is calculated on the 24-hour rolling period which will end at 11:29 am the next day.
